excerpt: After some time playing around with papervision3d ( helloworld3, primitives, chocolateblur, add) I started recreating my old Cubejunky game. The end is not in sight yet (all work and no play) but I still want to give you a little preview of what’s to come: Cubejunky in pv3d.
title: cubejunky
content:
After some time playing around with papervision3d (
helloworld3,
primitives,
chocolateblur,
add) I started recreating my old Cubejunky game. The end is not in sight yet (all work and no play) but I still want to give you a little preview of what’s to come:
Cubejunky in pv3d.
